title: We need to Pause AI
description: We are risking human extinction. We need to pause AI development, right now.

blocks.title: We risk <Mark>losing control</Mark>
blocks.content: AI can have amazing benefits, but it could also erode our democracy, destabilize our economy and could be used to create powerful cyber weapons.

blocks.title: We risk <Mark>human extinction</Mark>
blocks.content: Many AI labs and experts agree: AI could end humanity.
blocks.linkText: Why and how AI can kill us

blocks.title: We need a <Mark>pause</Mark>
blocks.content: Stop the development of AI systems more powerful than GPT-4 until we know how to make them safe. This needs to happen on an international level, and it needs to happen soon.

blocks.title: WE NEED TO ACT <Mark>RIGHT NOW</Mark>
blocks.content: In 2020, experts thought we had more than 35 years until AGI. Recent breakthroughs show we might be almost there. Superintelligence could be one innovation away, so we should tread carefully.

blocks.title: <Mark>YOU</Mark> CAN HELP
blocks.content: Too few people are well-informed about the potential risks of AI. Inform others, and help stop this race to the bottom.
